sentences.sContent: A sense of impending doom (= coming very soon ) gripped her.
sentences.sCn: 她心头被一种大难临头的感觉所笼罩。

sentences.sContent: The plan was doomed from the start.
sentences.sCn: 这个计划一开始就注定要失败。

sentences.sContent: ...a big fat cloud of doom is right at the top...

synos.tran: 厄运；死亡；判决；世界末日

words.tran: 世界末日；最后的审判日

trans.tranOther: something very bad that is going to happen, or the fact that it is going to happen
to make someone or something certain to fail, die, be destroyed etc
